listings.title: Classic Blue Button-Down Shirt
listings.description: Versatile button-down shirt in a classic navy blue. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own. Great condition, only worn a few times.
listings.washingInstructions: Machine wash cold on gentle cycle. Tumble dry low or hang to dry. Iron on medium heat if needed.

listings.title: Vintage Denim Jacket
listings.description: Classic denim jacket with a relaxed fit. Perfect for spring and fall weather. Has that broken-in vintage feel.
listings.washingInstructions: Machine wash cold, do not bleach. Tumble dry low or hang to dry. Avoid high heat.

listings.title: Essential White T-Shirt
listings.description: Soft, comfortable white t-shirt made from organic cotton. Perfect basic piece that goes with everything. Minimal wear.
listings.washingInstructions: Machine wash cold with like colors. Tumble dry low or hang to dry. May need occasional bleaching to maintain whiteness.
